description: The number of Guernesias speakers has declined to the point where it will "cease to be in a few years".
title: Bid to save 'endangered' Guernesias language agreed
title_page: Bid to save 'endangered' Guernesias language agreed - BBC News
maintext: The committee said the purpose of the commission would be to "halt and then reverse this decline" by raising awareness of Guernesiais and encouraging its participation and effective teaching.
